datastorage

Class ProductDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastorage.ProductDAO

  • public class ProductDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with the products.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wesley Heesters, Renée Vroedsteijn, Thomas Roovers
    See Also:
    OrderManager

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> retrieveProducts()

      • removeProduct

        public boolean removeProduct(int productNr)
        This method removes a product from the database.
        Parameters:
        productNr - The number of a product.
        Returns:
        True or false depending on the success of the method.

      • updateProduct

        public boolean updateProduct(int productNr,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             long price,
                             long prepTime)
        This method updates a product in the database.
        Parameters:
        productNr - The number of a product.
        name - The name of a product.
        price - The price of a product.
        prepTime - The preparation time of a product.
        Returns:
        True or false depending on the success of the method.

      • createNewProduct

        public int createNewProduct(long price,
                            int menuID,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            long prepTime)
        This method adds a new product to the database.
        Parameters:
        price - The price of a product.
        menuID - The "category" of a product.
        name - The name of a product.
        description - The description of a product.
        prepTime - The preparation time of a product.
        Returns:
        True or false depending on the success of the method.
